isis.stitle: ANTILOCK BRAKES/TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - PRINCIPLES, OPERATION AND SERVICE - INSTALL - ANTILOCK RELAY VALVE

step1.para: After noting the relationship of the positioning marks made prior to disassembly, position the gasket on the controller, then secure the controller to the antilock relay valve using the four bolts. Tighten the bolts to 50 to 80 in-lbs. (5.6 to 9.0 N•m).
Install all air line fittings and plugs (as marked during removal) making certain thread sealing material does not enter the valve.
Mount the assembled controller and antilock relay valve on the vehicle and orient it in the position marked prior to removal.
Connect all air lines and wiring cables to the valve and controller assembly using the identification made during valve removal.
After installing the valve and controller assembly, test all air fittings for excessive leakage and tighten as needed.
Perform the "INITIAL START-UP PROCEDURE." Refer to GROUP 04 - BRAKES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the model being serviced.
